title: Tiny Compression Test
body:
If you have a couple of minutes, please participate in this tiny compression test. I need to know if it’s compatible with all hardware/software configs that exist out there.

You need to download this 5 MB file:
https://www50.zippyshare.com/v/OPobUtkA/file.html

Then run it just like any of my repacks, and wait for less than a minute. Then make sure that QuickSFV results window shows that test.fgpack checksum is correct.

In either case (it’s OK or not) please post your config along with result in comments.

Example report:

Test is OK
Intel i5-6600K, Windows 10 Pro 1809, 16 GB RAM
